about_the_game:
Step into the enigmatic role of Menes, a celestial being without memory, thrust into a desolate realm filled with ancient secrets and relentless foes. As you traverse unforgiving landscapes, you must unravel the truth behind your mission, uncover forgotten powers, and confront the dark forces that threaten to undo the fabric of existence itself.

MENES combines intense platforming with the punishing challenge of a souls-like adventure experience. Navigate diverse prison realms, each filled with unique perils and foes—from cunning guardians to massive, elemental beings. Hone your skills, master tactical combat, and piece together the mysteries that bind the realms together.

Will you survive the trials and discover the truth about the origins, or will you fall to the shadows lurking in the desert and beyond?

As you traverse unforgiving landscapes, you must unravel the truth behind your mission, uncover forgotten powers, and confront the dark forces that threaten to undo the fabric of existence itself.

MENES combines intense platforming with the punishing challenge of a souls-like adventure experience. Navigate diverse prison realms, each filled with unique perils and foes—from cunning guardians to massive, elemental beings. Hone your skills, master tactical combat, and piece together the mysteries that bind the realms together.

Will you survive the trials and discover the truth about the origins, or will you fall to the shadows lurking in the desert and beyond?
name: Menes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 470, 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Embark on a perilous journey as Menes, an angel with no memory, sent to free a mysterious prisoner from a forgotten realm. Uncover dark secrets, face relentless enemies, and shape the fate of a universe on the brink of collapse. A platformer adventure awaits, with very similar vibes to Soul Reaver .
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
